document.title: Upper Teeth Aligner Treatment
document.summary: You'll be using clear aligners to straighten your upper teeth over about 4â€“6 months. We'll mostly check your progress remotely, so you won't need to come into the clinic often. Some attachments might be used to help with the tooth movement. Whitening is included as part of your treatment.
next_steps: Start treatment with initial set of aligners
Schedule any necessary check-ins if advised
